snippet: A Friday night beer garden is envisioned.
abstract: A Friday night beer garden is envisioned.
lead_paragraph: The Dekalb Market - the open-air crafts bazaar built out of shipping containers in Brooklyn - will serve beer and wine when it reopens for the spring, The Local blog reports. The plan was overwhelmingly approved on Wednesday night by a community board panel.

headline.main: Dekalb Market Will Have Beer and Wine
